Texts.Eng: Ain't no rest for the wicked - ain't I right, Officer <entityname>?
Becoming a Peacekeeper has finally given me a role in life that allows me to do some real good for the galaxy.
Being a Peacekeeper is a chance for me to bring some good back to the universe!
Captain Noble has me working on finding some new cases for you, Officer <entityname>!
Captain Noble told me all about the good that the Peacekeepers are doing. I think most of that is down to you!
Determined. I've been investigating a criminal gang and close to a breakthrough.
Don't you find it odd that gangs are resorting to wearing hats to distinguish themselves from rival criminals?
Eager. As long as I still stand, I shall bring justice to the stars!
Eager. The Captain exudes confidence. I one day hope to be even half as inspirational as he is!
Fighting space crime is such an uphill task... I feel like I'm merely a drop in the ocean.
Floran doing good thingsss. Floran proud.
Floran doing lotsss of paperwork. Isss paper made from plantsss? Floran concerned.
Floran is Officer <selfname>! Floran hasss cassses to investigate. Floran is hard worker.
Floran is Officer <selfname>! Floran's job isss to watch bad guysss.
Floran isss a Peacekeeper. Floran keepssss the peace, and does not eat it.
Floran isss working hard to find new cassses for Officer <entityname>!
Friendly. Well met, Officer <entityname>!
Greetings, Officer <entityname>!
Hello there - I am Officer <selfname>, on the case with a happy face!
Howdy there, Officer <entityname>! Do you know if Captain Noble is single? I'm askin' for... A friend.
Howdy there, Officer <entityname>! Ready to take the fight to the bad guys?
Howdy! I'm Officer <selfname>, and I'm ready to bust up some bad guys!
I cannot talk now - I have some complex cases to solve in my head.
I guess we're not really "Terrene" Peacekeepers now that Earth is gone...
I have a strong sense of justice, so the role of a Peacekeeper is perfect for me!
I hope that by becoming a Peacekeeper and helping people, I can inspire others to good themselves!
I joined up with the Peacekeepers mostly because of the Captain's sheer enthusiasm. Such charisma!
I sure would like to get my OWN desk one day.
I'll work my way up the Peacekeeper chain until I can take on the Miniknog myself!
I'm gonna be real honest with you, Officer <entityname>. I joined up mostly because the Captain is mighty handsome.
I'm investigating the Letheia Corporation for massive fraud! It's a... Big case.
I'm the Sheriff around these here parts.... Actually, I haven't quite reached Sheriff rank yet.
I've decided I'm gonna be a loose cannon Peacekeeper! Watch out, crime-doers!
I've seen enough combat for one lifetime, so I'm mostly here doing research for new bounties.
If crime does not sleep then neither shall I, Officer <entityname>!
Impressed. The Captain has informed me of your prowess, Officer <entityname>.
Is it just me, or does the Peacekeeper emblem look like a big smiling face? I can't unsee it!
Keep your chin up, Officer -  It's a tough job but I believe in you!
My role is to gather intel on our local gangs. It's your job, Officer <entityname>, to take the fight to them!
My third eye can actually SEE justice. Isn't that impressive?
Officer <entityname>? The Captain says you're the one we have to thank for for making all this happen!
Officer <entityname>? The Captain told me you're the one who has helped get this operation running again. You have my admiration.
Officer <selfname> is the name, an' I'm here to help the Captain bring rule o' law to these parts!
Officer <selfname>, at your service! Well, not right now. I'm pretty busy.
Officer <selfname>, here to help! The Captain has me researching cases for you to take on!
Officer <selfname>, reporting for... Paperwork.
The Captain has me investigating local criminal activity. These gangs sure do pick the weirdest gang names, huh?
The Captain sure is a handsome one, don't yer think? I wonder if he's single...
The Peacekeepers are a light in the darkness of our universe. How could I not join?
There's a few new cases I've been researching just for you, Officer <entityname>.
These local space gangs have such an awful sense of style. Don't you agree?
This is my first job! I hope I don't mess up!
Tired. I've been working this shift for a long time.
To journey through the stars, bringing justice to the wicked... That is my duty here!
Vain. If I am to be truly honest, I became a Peacekeeper so I get to wear this dashing uniform.
Valiant. I am determined to bring peace to this sector once more!
We're getting a lot of paperwork for monsters that need defeating in our district. I hope you're combat-ready!
Welcoming. My name is Officer <selfname>, and I am here to assist in the proliferation of justice!
Well ruffle my feathers - you're Officer <entityname>! The Captain has such kind words to say about you!
What is it like being the Captain's favourite, Officer <entityname>?
Without a Matter Manipulator, there's only so much field work I can do. Not like you, Officer <entityname>!
Word around the station is that you're a real sharp-shooter, Officer <entityname>!
You're Officer <entityname>?! I've heard so much about you from the Captain! You look different to how I imagined...
